SELECT rno, fbno, fupno, mno, id, fbody, ftitle, avatar, fdate, fedate, click, step FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, fbno, fupno, mno, id, fbody, ftitle, avatar, fdate, fedate, click, step FROM ( SELECT fbno, NVL(fupno, 0) fupno, mno, id, fbody, ftitle, savename avatar, fdate, fedate, click, (level - 1) step FROM freeboard f, member m, avatar a WHERE f.isshow = 'Y' AND fmno = mno AND avt = ano START WITH fupno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR fbno = fupno ORDER SIBLINGS BY fdate DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
